product_name: Moving Comfort Fearless Pants - Women's Long - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a flattering fit and comfortable fabric, the women's long-length Fearless Pants from Moving Comfort are as well suited to running errands as they are to yoga and mat work. Polyester/spandex fabric wicks moisture, dries fast and offers UPF 50+. Lined gusset and chafe-free seams add comfort. Wide Powermesh waistband slims and stays put, and has a hidden pocket. Moving Comfort Fearless Pants in women's long length are semi-fitted. Closeout.
short_description: With a flattering fit and comfortable fabric, the women's long-length Fearless Pants from Moving Comfort are as well suited to running errands as they are to yoga and mat work.
